EXPLORE NOW
Old Tay Ho brings together historical images, maps, and even documents to show how the area has evolved, which can stimulate a vibrant appreciation of the region, and evoke interest and communications among national and international communities.
ABOUT
OLD TAY HO - HISTORICAL MAP
Legend has it that Tay Ho was created by an agitated buffalo hearing the cries of its calf back in China.
Visit the neighborhoods of the lake today, and it can feel that frantic change is occurring along nearly every street or alleyway.
Often this is making for progress, and continuing to draw many Vietnamese and foreign residents and visitors. The old Tay Ho site aims to bring alive the heritage of the area, giving a sense of how old and new can best co-exist and evolve across this vibrant area.
Historical Images:
Presents photos to show specific places and structures in the area looked like.
Historical Maps:
View current Tay Ho maps overlaid on historical maps and even aerial images.
Historical Documents:
View key relevent historical documents and declarations.
READ MORE
